title: Investment Mastery: The Ultimate Indian Guide to Wealth Creation
author: Raghav D. Joshi
bookDescription: Investing is not just a game for big financial institutions or about claims of getting rich overnight – it is a well-thought-out plan that is open to every ordinary person.  This book explains in simple language how to strengthen your financial foundation based on the right mindset and solid principles. Whether you are new to the stock market or have some experience, here you will find:  Practical tips for setting your personal financial goals and creating an effective investment plan.  An easy introduction to various investment options like Stocks, Mutual Funds, Fixed Income instruments, and Real Estate.  A deep dive into risk management, disciplined savings, and the magic of compounding.  Strategies to refine your money mindset to navigate market fluctuations and keep investing wisely.  This book is not for a specific class of people, but for everyone who wants to grow their hard-earned money intelligently—whether you are a working professional, a homemaker, or someone approaching retirement.  Take a step towards your dreams and see how, with the right thinking and a disciplined strategy, you can make the path to financial freedom easier.
